channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: "Comms" box insecure at junction of Kent House Road and Parish Lane., 24th December
item.description:

item.title: Likely watermain broken in pavement, 24th December
item.description:
There is water coming out of paving stones in front of the tree on Brixton Road station and Gresham Road Junction. Water is coming out and pouring into drainage along the street.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 57, Gresham Road, Brixton, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.category: Fly-tip Small - Less than one bag

item.title: Fallen leaves covering footpath, 24th December
item.description:
This time of year the footpath gets very narrow due to fallen leaves, they are very slippery to walk on. This is a busy walkway to the shops, used by a lot of people, including elderly.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Squirrels Close, White Oak, Swanley
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Two large yellow covers on the pavement, 24th December
item.description:
These covers have been on the pavement for some time and are dangerous for people using the footpath. Particularly when it has been raining and they are wet as they are slippery. They are also dangerous for people with disabilities to negotiate.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Beckenham Lane, Shortlands, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
